com.noctarius.tengi.core.config

Class ConfigurationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.noctarius.tengi.core.config.ConfigurationBuilder

  • public class ConfigurationBuilder
extends Object

    The ConfigurationBuilder is designed to create an immutable instance of the Configuration interface. It supports a fluent configuration style and collects all necessary properties or uses some meaningful defaults.

    The internal design of the ConfigurationBuilder is not thread-safe and therefore it is not recommended to use if from multiple threads concurrently.

    • Method Detail

      • addMarshaller

        public ConfigurationBuilder addMarshaller(MarshallerFilter marshallerFilter,
                                          Marshaller marshaller)
        Configures a new Marshaller and a corresponding MarshallerFilter to be injected into the internal serializer framework.
        Parameters:
        marshallerFilter - the MarshallerFilter to be bound
        marshaller - the Marshaller to be bound
        Returns:
        this instance of the ConfigurationBuilder for fluent programing style

      • addMarshaller

        public <O,I> ConfigurationBuilder addMarshaller(MarshallerFilter marshallerFilter,
                                                I marshallerId,
                                                MarshallerReader<O> reader,
                                                MarshallerWriter<O> writer)

        Configures a new Marshaller and a corresponding MarshallerFilter to be injected into the internal serializer framework. This method supports Java 8 Lambdas and the bound Marshaller is internally created by the given MarshallerReader and MarshallerWriter.

        The given marshallerId will be written to the byte-stream to identify the created Marshaller.

        Type Parameters:
        O - the value type to be marshalled and un-marshalled
        I - the type of the marshaller ID
        Parameters:
        marshallerFilter - the MarshallerFilter to be bound
        marshallerId - the id for the generated Marshaller
        reader - the MarshallerReader to be delegated to for un-marshalling
        writer - the MarshallerWriter to be delegated to for marshalling
        Returns:
        this instance of the ConfigurationBuilder for fluent programing style

      • addTransport

        public ConfigurationBuilder addTransport(Transport transport)

        Adds a Transport to the possible transports. The transport will be added to the current index of the internal list. Transport will later be connected in this very order.

        If the same transport is added multiple times to the configuration it will be tried multiple times as well. There is no duplication check and duplicates are fully supported.

        Parameters:
        transport - the Transport to be added
        Returns:
        this instance of the ConfigurationBuilder for fluent programing style

      • addTransport

        public ConfigurationBuilder addTransport(Transport... transports)

        Adds one or more Transports to the possible transports. The transports will be added to the current index of the internal list. Transport will later be connected in this very order.

        If the same transport is added multiple times to the configuration it will be tried multiple times as well. There is no duplication check and duplicates are fully supported.

        Parameters:
        transports - the Transports to be added
        Returns:
        this instance of the ConfigurationBuilder for fluent programing style

      • transportPort

        public ConfigurationBuilder transportPort(Transport transport,
                                          int port)
        Configures an explicit mapping of a port (for example TCP or UDP) to the given Transport. Any previously configured port for this very transport is overridden. Any configuration also overrides the default port from the transport. The port must be between 1 and 65535, restriction from the operating system might apply and define a different range of usable port numbers.
        Parameters:
        transport - the Transport to bind to the port
        port - the port to bind the Transport to
        Returns:
        this instance of the ConfigurationBuilder for fluent programing style

      • ssl

        public ConfigurationBuilder ssl(boolean sslEnabled)
        Defines if the Transports should use SSL. This only applies to transports that support SSL encrypted connection. Please refer to any Transport documentation to find out if SSL is supported or not. Calling this method multiple times will override any previously set value.
        Parameters:
        sslEnabled - true to enable SSL, false to disable it
        Returns:
        this instance of the ConfigurationBuilder for fluent programing style

      • handshakeHandler

        public ConfigurationBuilder handshakeHandler(HandshakeHandler handshakeHandler)
        Defines the HandshakeHandler instance to verify, accept or deny new connection handshakes. On client-side additional information can be extracted from the handshake response retrieved from the server.
        Parameters:
        handshakeHandler - the HandshakeHandler instance to be configured
        Returns:
        this instance of the ConfigurationBuilder for fluent programing style

      • build

        public Configuration build()
        Build the Configuration instance with any values currently set in this ConfigurationBuilder instance. The created configuration is immutable and can't be changed afterwards.
        Returns:
        an immutable Configuration instance bound to the prior configured settings
